Lightly padded sleep mask in patterned satin with covered elastication at the back and a matching drawstring bag.
Hat in soft, rib-knit chenille with a soft faux fur pompom on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Fitted top in a soft rib-knit viscose blend with a polo neck, short sleeves, short slits in the sides and overlocked edges.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit containing some alpaca wool. Width approx. 53 cm, circumference approx. 150 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit containing some alpaca wool. Width approx. 53 cm, circumference approx. 150 cm.

Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a lyocell blend containing some linen with an opening and ties at the top and short puff sleeves. Narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.

Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a lyocell blend containing some linen with an opening and ties at the top and short puff sleeves. Narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.
Fitted, smocked top woven in a linen blend with elasticated shoulder straps, buttons down the front and frill trims.
Fitted, smocked top woven in a linen blend with elasticated shoulder straps, buttons down the front and frill trims.
Fitted, smocked top woven in a linen blend with elasticated shoulder straps, buttons down the front and frill trims.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short dress in an airy, patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a soft, airy viscose weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a small frill trim, and a seam and flare at the hem.

Short dress in a soft, airy viscose weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a small frill trim, and a seam and flare at the hem.

Short dress in a soft, airy viscose weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a small frill trim, and a seam and flare at the hem.
Satin playsuit with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a loose wrapover front with ties at one side.
Short, off-the-shoulder flounced dress woven in a textured Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short sleeves with elastication at the top. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder flounced dress woven in a textured Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short sleeves with elastication at the top. Lined.
Wide, ankle-length dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow shoulder straps with decorative ties at the top, and a slit at the front.
Wide, ankle-length dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow shoulder straps with decorative ties at the top, and a slit at the front.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a seam with a wide panel under the bust. Short puff-sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a flared skirt with a slit at the front. Lined.
Short dress in softly draping satin with a sheen. V-neck, a wrapover front with narrow ties, short, wide puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Body in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Long shirt in an airy viscose weave. Relaxed fit with a V-neck, notch lapels and buttons down the front with a double-layered button band. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short, straight-cut blouse in a linen weave with a wide neckline, covered buttons down the front, a concealed zip in one side and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Blouse in an airy linen and cotton weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with narrow ties at the waist, and short ballon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress woven in a patterned linen blend with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently flared skirt with side pockets. Flounced trim around the sleeves and hem. Lined.
Long dress in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover front. Seam with narrow ties at the waist that fasten on one side, and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Lined.
Straight-cut blouse in airy weave with covered buttons down the back, gathers at the shoulders and short balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in airy weave with covered buttons down the back, gathers at the shoulders and short balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication. Unlined.
